TextView.android:text: For latest information go to http://www.nononsenseapps.com
\n- More synchronization tweaks. Deleting the default list in google tasks should no longer crash sync. Instead the list is simply redownloaded (Google does not permit the list to be deleted).

\n- Fixed an error in the synchronization (sorry about any lost notes). Changes on the server are no longer overwritten. If a note has been edited both in the app and on the server, a conflict will arise. In that case, the local version gets 'sync-conflict' added to its title and the server's version is downloaded so you can keep the one you want.
\n- Completed notes no longer get their contents deleted.

- Syncing code has been revised. Conficting notes on the server are no longer overwritten. Instead a local copy is made. This creates duplicates in case there are conflicts but should guarantee that no data is lost.

- Lists are now displayed in swipeable tabs.

- Editor layout has been revised and now has a hidden section with all the properties like list, due date, etc..

- New 1x1 'New note' widget. Creates notes in your selected default list.

- Due date dialog now displays a full calendar view on phones.

- The app should now remember what list you had opened previously instead of opening the default list when you switch orientation or turn off the screen.

- Fixed clicking on the title of notes that did not open the note in certain widget configurations.

- Dark widgets have received increased transparency.

- Dark theme now has true black as background.

- Layout has been optimized for Nexus7.

- All clickable things in the widgets will now highlight on touch.

- Fixed crashes related to landscape changes.

- New and updated translations.

- Sync button now requests access and enables syncing instead of opening settings when no syncing has been enabled yet.

- Improved scrolling on long notes in the editor.

- Added a welcome note for first time users.

- Added option of showing or hiding the note preview when adding a widget to your homescreen.

- Added option to show or hide buttons to mark tasks as done in the widget.

- Enlarged the touch area for the checkbox in the list. Should make it harder to miss the box now.

- Possible to type in landscape mode on phones again.

- Added a choice between two list item layouts which can be chosen in the settings.

- Fixed so password protected notes do not reveal their contents in the list
- Fixed a crash.\n\n- Implemented a receiver for added widget functionality (soon)

- This change log.

- Chinese translation.

- Removed auto reloading of notes as it would overwrite changes.

- Keyboard is opened automatically when creating new notes.

- Note titles are now single line but in return a new next-button should appear on your keyboard which will move the cursor directly to the notes field.

- Widget title is once again on the left.

- Widget items are now smaller at the cost of the note preview field. This means more visible items which has been heavily requested.

- Now impossible to delete a list if it is the only list as you could end up in a crash loop when you had no lists.

- Completing or moving a note to another list should no longer delete the changes you made if they were not saved. All changes are now saved prior to any action being taken.

- Moved the complete button to the overflow menu again as people confused it with a save button.

- Various bugs and crashes should be fixed.
